abstract: New York City FC defeats Vancouver Whitecaps, 3-2.

headline.main: Tiebreaker by Steven Mendoza Lifts N.Y.C.F.C.

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Mendoza broke a tie in the 73rd minute, and New York City F.C. beat the Vancouver Whitecaps, 3-2, on Saturday at Yankee Stadium, ending a seven-game winless streak.
lead_paragraph: Mendoza broke a tie in the 73rd minute, and New York City F.C. beat the Vancouver Whitecaps, 3-2, on Saturday at Yankee Stadium, ending a seven-game winless streak.
